sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect } from 'react';
import styled, { keyframes } from 'styled-components';
import AOS from 'aos'; // AOS for scroll animations
import 'aos/dist/aos.css'; // AOS CSS import

const Home = () => {
  useEffect(() => {
    AOS.init({ duration: 1200 }); // Initialize AOS
  }, []);

  return (
    <Container>
      {/* Hero Section */}
      <Hero>
        <HeroContent data-aos="fade-up">
          <Title>Welcome to FitLife</Title>
          <Subtitle>Your Personal Fitness Companion</Subtitle>
          <Button>Get Started</Button>
        </HeroContent>
      </Hero>

      {/* Goals and Features Section */}
      <Section>
        <SectionTitle data-aos="fade-right">Why FitLife?</SectionTitle>
        <Features>
          <FeatureCard data-aos="zoom-in">
            <Icon>🔥</Icon>
            <FeatureTitle>Track Your Goals</FeatureTitle>
            <FeatureDescription>
              Set and monitor daily calorie intake, weight targets, and more to stay on track with your fitness journey.
            </FeatureDescription>
          </FeatureCard>
          <FeatureCard data-aos="zoom-in" data-aos-delay="200">
            <Icon>📊</Icon>
            <FeatureTitle>Personalized Insights</FeatureTitle>
            <FeatureDescription>
              Receive personalized insights based on your data to optimize your fitness and diet plans.
            </FeatureDescription>
          </FeatureCard>
          <FeatureCard data-aos="zoom-in" data-aos-delay="400">
            <Icon>🏆</Icon>
            <FeatureTitle>Achieve Your Goals</FeatureTitle>
            <FeatureDescription>
              With clear goal tracking and feedback, FitLife helps you reach your fitness milestones.
            </FeatureDescription>
          </FeatureCard>
        </Features>
      </Section>

      {/* Testimonials Section */}
      <Section>
        <SectionTitle data-aos="fade-right">What Our Users Say</SectionTitle>
        <Testimonials>
          <TestimonialCard data-aos="flip-left">
            <Quote>“FitLife has completely transformed the way I approach my fitness goals!”</Quote>
            <Author>- John D.</Author>
          </TestimonialCard>
          <TestimonialCard data-aos="flip-left" data-aos-delay="200">
            <Quote>“The personalized insights are a game-changer for my daily routine!”</Quote>
            <Author>- Sarah L.</Author>
          </TestimonialCard>
        </Testimonials>
      </Section>

      {/* Call to Action Section */}
      <CTASection data-aos="fade-up">
        <CTATitle>Ready to Start Your Fitness Journey?</CTATitle>
        <CTADescription>Join FitLife today and begin transforming your life!</CTADescription>
        <CTAButton>Join Now</CTAButton>
      </CTASection>
    </Container>
  );
};

export default Home;
